title: For trade/sale:  T206 Carolina Brights Evers
author: David R

posts.post_title: For trade/sale:  T206 Carolina Brights Evers
posts.post_content:
I am looking for the t206s listed below and have this Evers Carolina Brights to use as part of a cash/trade deal:  

Looking for:

Mathewson White Cap -- Hindu 
Cobb Bat On - Sovereign
Johnson pitching -- American Beauty, Cycle
Cobb Red -- American Beauty, Cycle
Johnson portrait -- Old Mill
Young portrait -- Old Mill
